lib.jog

Interface input.EventHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Altimeter, Credits, Demo, DifficultySelect, Game, GameEnding, GameOver, Main, Scene, Shop, Title
    Enclosing class:
    input 

    public static interface input.EventHandler
    Interface for a class that is to receive keyboard and mouse events.
    Author:
    IMP1

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Called when a keyboard key has been depressed.

    • Method Detail

      • mousePressed

        void mousePressed(int key,
                int x,
                int y)
        Called when a mouse button has been depressed.
        Parameters:
        key - the button being pressed.
        x - the horizontal position of the mouse.
        y - the vertical position of the mouse.

      • mouseReleased

        void mouseReleased(int key,
                 int x,
                 int y)
        Called when a mouse button has been released.
        Parameters:
        key - the button being released.
        x - the horizontal position of the mouse.
        y - the vertical position of the mouse.
